fixed_skill.desc: Increase next magic damage by 52.1%/54.7%/57.3%. Lasts for 1 turn.
fixed_skill.name: Concentrate

innate_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 114.0/119.7/125.4% of Attack. 63.3/66.5/69.6% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Zionga

innate_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 57.0/59.8/62.7% of Attack. 31.7/33.3/34.9% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mazionga

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 17%. After using a skill on user, increase Attack by 40% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Cut the Threads of Fate

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 17%. After using a skill on user, increase Attack by 46% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Cut the Threads of Fate I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 17%. After using a skill on user, increase Attack by 52% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Cut the Threads of Fate II

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
